titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for suspending the time of healing the disease called, The kings evill, until Easter next.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And by the Assignes of John Bill.,

notesStmt.note: At head of sheet, royal arms with initials "C R"; initial.
"Given at Our Court at Oatlands the second day of September, in the fourteenth yeer of Our Reign."
Reproduction of original in: Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine. Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And
